findings.title: A floating pragma is set (SWC-103)
findings.contract: IBasisAsset.sol, Boardroom.sol, SafeERC20.sol, ContractGuard.sol, IERC20.sol, ITreasury.sol, SafeMath.sol, Address.sol

findings.title: Use of "tx.origin" as a part of authorization control (SWC-115)
findings.description: Use of tx.origin should not be used for authorization. Use msg.sender instead.

findings.title: Potential use of “block.number” as source of randomness (SWC-120)
findings.description: Using block.number as a source of randomness is insecure and can be exploited.
